extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the Time Machine backup destination.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh enabled=`/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.TimeMachine AutoBackup` if [ "$enabled" == "1" ];then validateDestination=`/usr/sbin/diskutil info $(/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.TimeMachine "DestinationVolumeUUID") | awk '{print $1, $2}'` if [ "$validateDestination" == "Could not" ];then echo "<result>Destination not mounted</result>" else backupDestination=`/usr/sbin/diskutil info $(/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.TimeMachine "DestinationVolumeUUID") | grep "Mount Point" | /usr/bin/cut -c 30-` echo "<result>$backupDestination</result>" fi else echo "<result>Not enabled.</result>" fi
